name: Chronicles of Sarval: Bridges of Koni
name_original: Chronicles of Sarval: Bridges of Koni
description:
The bridges of the kingdom of Koni have been bewitched...

After the appearance of a mysterious wizard in the kingdom of Koni, King Nabonus woke up in his pajamas in the center of the city, without the key to his castle and with the famous bridges of his kingdom bewitched. Desperate, he sent a call for help to all of Sarval in search of some wizard who could save his kingdom.
In Chronicles of Sarval: Bridges of Koni the player is the wizard Helm, from the League of Extraordinary Mages and friend of the wizards Euller and Isac, who left to take advantage of his vacation to go to the Kingdom of Koni to solve the problem of bridges.

Chronicles of Sarval: Bridges of Koni is a puzzle adventure game set in a quirky story, striking characters and a surprising ending. The game features beautiful 2D pixel art, varied environments and over 30 challenges. The mechanics are simple, with horizontal and vertical movements, increased speed and pushing objects.

To help the Kingdom of Koni and solve the problem of bridges, the player must find in each stage the path that passes only once through each of the bridges, dodging enemies, collecting coins and before the time runs out. The bridges connect the islands of the stages and whenever the player crosses the bridge it is destroyed.
